Module c195.c195assessment
Package c195.c195assessment.helper

Class AppContext

java.lang.Object
c195.c195assessment.helper.AppContext
public class AppContext extends Object
This class provides a global context for the application, holding information about the current user's locale, time zone, and login information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static AppContext
    getInstance()
    Returns the single instance of AppContext, creating it if it does not yet exist.

    Retrieves the current user information.

    Retrieves the locale of the current user.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AppContext getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of AppContext, creating it if it does not yet exist.
      Returns:
      The single, static instance of AppContext.

    • getUserLocale

      public static Locale getUserLocale()
      Retrieves the locale of the current user.
      Returns:
      The Locale object representing the user's locale.

    • getUserTimeZone

      public static TimeZone getUserTimeZone()
      Retrieves the time zone of the current user.
      Returns:
      The TimeZone object representing the user's time zone.

    • setUser

      public static void setUser(User user)
      Updates the current user information. This method is only called upon user login.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the user's login information. Passing null clears the current user information.

    • getUser

      public static User getUser()
      Retrieves the current user information.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the current user, or null if no user is logged in.
